Xu Zhang

Postdoctoral Research Scientist

Email: xu.zhang@columbia.edu

Web: https://xu-zhang-1987.github.io/

About Me

I’m a postdoctoral research scientist at Digital Video and MultiMedia Lab at the Columbia University in the city of New York, supervised by Prof. Shih-Fu Chang. I obtained a Ph.D. from Tsinghua University, Beijing, China, in 2016, supervised by Prof. Shengjin Wang. My research interests include local feature detection and description, large scale image retrieval and image forensics.

Projects

Visual Political Literacy Project

Given a protest image, detect and recognize all political symbols in the image. The project helps journalists recognized different symbols. [project page]

Danesfield

The goal of this software is to reconstruct semantically meaningful 3D models of buildings and other man-made structures from satellite imagery. [project page]
